title: Multimedia-Enhanced Advanced Science Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Students explore visual and auditory representations of scientific concepts using VR headsets and smart devices, while managing learning progress through an LMS

learning_goals: Learners identify core concepts (e.g., molecular structures, ecosystem cycles) needed to explain scientific phenomena in VR simulations with over 80% accuracy.

Over 2–4 weeks, learners analyze two science problems (e.g., ecosystem cycles, molecular structures) using three provided animations and two 3D models, and explain the solution process through a 3-minute oral presentation or a 300-character written report integrating multimedia materials and text descriptions.
Learners comparatively analyze the impact of multimedia design principles (e.g., spatial proximity, consistency) on conceptual understanding through post-learning assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
